about_the_game:
ABOUT THIS CONTENT:

An eerily beautiful collection of art for Deck of Ashes created by AYGames.

This bundle includes:

1) Print-ready A2 digital posters
2) HD-quality desktop wallpapers

CREDITS:

Art-direction:
Ekaterina Belehova

2D artists:
Irina Efremova
Mikhail Logachev
Yulia Novoseltseva
detailed_description:
A unique and challenging puzzle adventure Tetragon is out now!


About the Game

ABOUT THIS CONTENT:

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 / SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.0GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 (512MB) / ATI Radeon HD 2900 (512MB)
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 / SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 2.66GHz / AMD Phenom
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 (1GB) / ATI Radeon HD 5850 (1GB)
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOSX 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 – 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6490M 256 МБ
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOSX 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400S, 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6750M (512 Мб)
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
